author: Hannah Al-Othman
title: A War Veteran Has Raised Millions Of Pounds For NHS Charities To Mark His 100th Birthday
description: Captain Tom Moore set out to raise £1,000 by walking 100 laps of his garden before his 100th birthday — but has already raised more than £13,000,000. View Entire Post ›
content:
